how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
Hunt the Devil for Karlach's personal questline. Companions assist the player by joining their party and have their own backstories and unique characteristics. They all have their own Classes and starting equipment, but you can change their classes via Respec in camp. Companions can also be selected as an Origin in the Character Creation screen allowing players to play from their point of view.

I was a prisoner, forced to fight in the Blood War. The eternal battle between bad and worse.
